类 MFShine2Device

    public class MFShine2Device
extends MFDevice
    MFDevice subclass for Shine2(Pluto)

      Connect the device with HID profile, Once you are in HID connection, the device will be able to send mapped event to user's phone.

      • startSync

        public void startSync(MFSyncParams syncParams,
                      MFOperationResultCallback resultCallback,
                      MFConfigurationCallback configurationCallback,
                      MFDataCallback dataCallback,
                      MFOtaCallback otaListener)
        从类复制的说明: MFDevice
        Start to sync data and settings with device, it may include an ota operation
        指定者:
        startSync 在类中 MFDevice
        参数:
        syncParams - basic parameters needed to start sync, refer MFSyncParams
        resultCallback - the callback of sync operation state
        configurationCallback - the callback of get device configuration
        dataCallback - the callback of get sync data
        otaListener - the callback of ota

      • connectHid

        public void connectHid(com.misfit.misfitsdk.callback.MFHIdConnectionCallback connectionCallback,
                       MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        从类复制的说明: MFDevice
        Connect the device with HID profile, Once you are in HID connection, the device will be able to send mapped event to user's phone.
        覆盖:
        connectHid 在类中 MFDevice
        参数:
        connectionCallback - the HID connection callback which need to register
        callback - the callback of command executed state

      • mapEvent

        public void mapEvent(com.misfit.misfitsdk.enums.MFUserInput userInput,
                     com.misfit.misfitsdk.enums.MFEvent event,
                     MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        从类复制的说明: MFDevice
        Mapping user's input with some event, if the specified input occurs, the correspond event will be send to user's phone via HID connection, see also:
        MFDevice.connectHid(MFHIdConnectionCallback, MFOperationResultCallback)

        MFDevice.disconnectHid(MFHIdConnectionCallback)
        覆盖:
        mapEvent 在类中 MFDevice
        参数:
        userInput - user's input
        event - the mapped event
        callback - the callback of command executed state

      • hasFeature

        public boolean hasFeature(com.misfit.misfitsdk.model.SupportedFeature feature)
        从类复制的说明: MFDevice
        Judge whether device support feature
        指定者:
        hasFeature 在接口中 com.misfit.misfitsdk.DeviceBehavior
        覆盖:
        hasFeature 在类中 MFDevice
        参数:
        feature - the feature to be judged
        返回:

        true - current device support this feature

        false - current device doesn't support this feature
